page.title: 02Elstead village cont.
page.content: All three churches are low in attendance with as little as 24 attending morning services at the United Reform and at the Catholic Churches. The main activities in the village are scouts, cubs, guides, Women's Institutes, Youth club, Good Companions, Drama Group, badminton, horse riding, British Legion Club. There is a Village Hall & Youth Centre which are both occupied each evening of the week with various activities. The Youth Centre also accomodates the Scout & Guide organisations. The majority of the people who do work in or around the village are either builders, decorators, service trades, shop assistants, farm workers.
